KSWriteROOTConditionOutputBuilder.h
1 #ifndef Kassiopeia_KSWriteROOTConditionOutputBuilder_h_
2 #define Kassiopeia_KSWriteROOTConditionOutputBuilder_h_
3 
4 #include "KComplexElement.hh"
5 #include "KSWriteROOTConditionOutput.h"
6 #include "KToolbox.h"
7 #include "KSComponentGroup.h"
8 #include <limits>
9 
10 using namespace Kassiopeia;
11 namespace katrin
12 {
13 
14  class KSWriteROOTConditionOutputData
15  {
16  public:
17  std::string fName;
18  std::string fGroupName;
19  std::string fComponentName;
20  double fMinValue;
21  double fMaxValue;
22  };
23 
24  typedef KComplexElement< KSWriteROOTConditionOutputData > KSWriteROOTConditionOutputBuilder;
25 
26  template< >
27  inline bool KSWriteROOTConditionOutputBuilder::Begin()
28  {
29  fObject = new KSWriteROOTConditionOutputData;
30  fObject->fMinValue = -1.0*std::numeric_limits< double >::max();
31  fObject->fMaxValue = std::numeric_limits< double >::max();
32  return true;
33  }
34 
35  template< >
36  inline bool KSWriteROOTConditionOutputBuilder::AddAttribute( KContainer* aContainer )
37  {
38  if( aContainer->GetName() == "name" )
39  {
40  std::string tName = aContainer->AsReference< std::string >();
41  fObject->fName = tName;
42  return true;
43  }
44  if( aContainer->GetName() == "min_value" )
45  {
46  double tValue = aContainer->AsReference< double >();
47  fObject->fMinValue = tValue;
48  return true;
49  }
50  if( aContainer->GetName() == "max_value" )
51  {
52  double tValue = aContainer->AsReference< double >();
53  fObject->fMaxValue = tValue;
54  return true;
55  }
56  if( aContainer->GetName() == "group" )
57  {
58  std::string tName = aContainer->AsReference< std::string >();
59  fObject->fGroupName = tName;
60  return true;
61  }
62  if( aContainer->GetName() == "parent" )
63  {
64  std::string tName = aContainer->AsReference< std::string >();
65  fObject->fComponentName = tName;
66  return true;
67  }
68  return false;
69  }
70 
71  template< >
72  inline bool KSWriteROOTConditionOutputBuilder::End()
73  {
74  KSComponent* tComponent = NULL;
75  if( fObject->fGroupName.empty() == false )
76  {
77  KSComponentGroup* tComponentGroup = KToolbox::GetInstance().Get< KSComponentGroup >( fObject->fGroupName );
78  for( unsigned int tIndex = 0; tIndex < tComponentGroup->ComponentCount(); tIndex++ )
79  {
80  KSComponent* tGroupComponent = tComponentGroup->ComponentAt( tIndex );
81  if( tGroupComponent->GetName() == fObject->fComponentName )
82  {
83  tComponent = tGroupComponent;
84  break;
85  }
86  }
87  if( tComponent == NULL )
88  {
89  objctmsg( eError ) << "write ROOT condition output builder could not find component <" << fObject->fComponentName << "> in group <" << fObject->fGroupName << ">" << eom;
90  return false;
91  }
92  }
93  else
94  {
95  tComponent = KToolbox::GetInstance().Get< KSComponent >( fObject->fComponentName );
96  }
97 
98 
99  KSWriteROOTCondition* tCondition = NULL;
100 
101  if( tComponent->Is< unsigned short >() == true )
102  {
103  KSWriteROOTConditionOutput< unsigned short >* tWriteROOTConditionOutput = new KSWriteROOTConditionOutput< unsigned short >();
104  tWriteROOTConditionOutput->SetName( fObject->fName );
105  tWriteROOTConditionOutput->SetMinValue( fObject->fMinValue );
106  tWriteROOTConditionOutput->SetMaxValue( fObject->fMaxValue );
107  tWriteROOTConditionOutput->SetValue( tComponent->As< unsigned short >() );
108  tCondition = tWriteROOTConditionOutput;
109  delete fObject;
110  Set( tCondition );
111  return true;
112  }
113 
114  if( tComponent->Is< short >() == true )
115  {
116  KSWriteROOTConditionOutput< short >* tWriteROOTConditionOutput = new KSWriteROOTConditionOutput< short >();
117  tWriteROOTConditionOutput->SetName( fObject->fName );
118  tWriteROOTConditionOutput->SetMinValue( fObject->fMinValue );
119  tWriteROOTConditionOutput->SetMaxValue( fObject->fMaxValue );
120  tWriteROOTConditionOutput->SetValue( tComponent->As< short >() );
121  tCondition = tWriteROOTConditionOutput;
122  delete fObject;
123  Set( tCondition );
124  return true;
125  }
126 
127  if( tComponent->Is< unsigned int >() == true )
128  {
129  KSWriteROOTConditionOutput< unsigned int >* tWriteROOTConditionOutput = new KSWriteROOTConditionOutput< unsigned int >();
130  tWriteROOTConditionOutput->SetName( fObject->fName );
131  tWriteROOTConditionOutput->SetMinValue( fObject->fMinValue );
132  tWriteROOTConditionOutput->SetMaxValue( fObject->fMaxValue );
133  tWriteROOTConditionOutput->SetValue( tComponent->As< unsigned int >() );
134  tCondition = tWriteROOTConditionOutput;
135  delete fObject;
136  Set( tCondition );
137  return true;
138  }
139 
140  if( tComponent->Is< int >() == true )
141  {
142  KSWriteROOTConditionOutput< int >* tWriteROOTConditionOutput = new KSWriteROOTConditionOutput< int >();
143  tWriteROOTConditionOutput->SetName( fObject->fName );
144  tWriteROOTConditionOutput->SetMinValue( fObject->fMinValue );
145  tWriteROOTConditionOutput->SetMaxValue( fObject->fMaxValue );
146  tWriteROOTConditionOutput->SetValue( tComponent->As< int >() );
147  tCondition = tWriteROOTConditionOutput;
148  delete fObject;
149  Set( tCondition );
150  return true;
151  }
152 
153  if( tComponent->Is< unsigned long >() == true )
154  {
155  KSWriteROOTConditionOutput< unsigned long >* tWriteROOTConditionOutput = new KSWriteROOTConditionOutput< unsigned long >();
156  tWriteROOTConditionOutput->SetName( fObject->fName );
157  tWriteROOTConditionOutput->SetMinValue( fObject->fMinValue );
158  tWriteROOTConditionOutput->SetMaxValue( fObject->fMaxValue );
159  tWriteROOTConditionOutput->SetValue( tComponent->As< unsigned long >() );
160  tCondition = tWriteROOTConditionOutput;
161  delete fObject;
162  Set( tCondition );
163  return true;
164  }
165 
166  if( tComponent->Is< long >() == true )
167  {
168  KSWriteROOTConditionOutput< long >* tWriteROOTConditionOutput = new KSWriteROOTConditionOutput< long >();
169  tWriteROOTConditionOutput->SetName( fObject->fName );
170  tWriteROOTConditionOutput->SetMinValue( fObject->fMinValue );
171  tWriteROOTConditionOutput->SetMaxValue( fObject->fMaxValue );
172  tWriteROOTConditionOutput->SetValue( tComponent->As< long >() );
173  tCondition = tWriteROOTConditionOutput;
174  delete fObject;
175  Set( tCondition );
176  return true;
177  }
178 
179  if( tComponent->Is< float >() == true )
180  {
181  KSWriteROOTConditionOutput< float >* tWriteROOTConditionOutput = new KSWriteROOTConditionOutput< float >();
182  tWriteROOTConditionOutput->SetName( fObject->fName );
183  tWriteROOTConditionOutput->SetMinValue( fObject->fMinValue );
184  tWriteROOTConditionOutput->SetMaxValue( fObject->fMaxValue );
185  tWriteROOTConditionOutput->SetValue( tComponent->As< float >() );
186  tCondition = tWriteROOTConditionOutput;
187  delete fObject;
188  Set( tCondition );
189  return true;
190  }
191 
192  if( tComponent->Is< double >() == true )
193  {
194  KSWriteROOTConditionOutput< double >* tWriteROOTConditionOutput = new KSWriteROOTConditionOutput< double >();
195  tWriteROOTConditionOutput->SetName( fObject->fName );
196  tWriteROOTConditionOutput->SetMinValue( fObject->fMinValue );
197  tWriteROOTConditionOutput->SetMaxValue( fObject->fMaxValue );
198  tWriteROOTConditionOutput->SetValue( tComponent->As< double >() );
199  tCondition = tWriteROOTConditionOutput;
200  delete fObject;
201  Set( tCondition );
202  return true;
203  }
204 
205  objctmsg( eError ) << "component in write ROOT condition output builder is of non supported type " << eom;
206  return false;
207  }
